body_content.explanation: material in the form of a strip that is put around doors and windows so that wind and rain cannot get through, or the act of putting this type of strip around doors and windows :
examples: Use weatherstripping to fill gaps where the bottom edge of a window meets the sill.
Most homes could use more insulation, weather stripping and other modest improvements to make them more energy efficient.
The doors have sealed-unit double glazing and built-in weather-stripping.
I've done the obvious things to save energy. I've done the caulking and the weatherstripping.
